name: SNATCH (Noltisoft)
description: Collect all items and beware of the surveilance droid. Press any controler button to activate your shield. Source code is available on Github: https://github.com/HNE74/Intybasicprogs/tree/main/snatch Created using Intybasic by Óscar Toledo Gutiérrez: https://github.com/nanochess/IntyBASIC
